# init(device:imageDescriptor:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an empty image.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(device: any MTLDevice, imageDescriptor: MPSImageDescriptor)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The device on which the image will be used.
- **imageDescriptor**: The image descriptor.

## Return Value

A valid [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImage] object or `nil`, if failure.

## Discussion

Storage for the image data is allocated lazily on the first use of the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImage] object, or when the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImage/texture] property is first read.

## Initializers

- **MPSImageDescriptor**: A description of the attributes used to create an [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSImage].
- **init(texture:featureChannels:)**: Initializes an image from a texture. The user-allocated texture has been created for a specific number of feature channels and number of images.
- **init(parentImage:sliceRange:featureChannels:)**
